channel.title: Can some one help me add to to one of my scripts?
channel.description:
I have a scirpt for rs (runescape) and was hoping to get some help making it talk in runescape.
Heres the code i have. [code]program AutoClicker; begin GetSelf.Hide wait(5000) repeat ClickMouse(379, 366, True); wait(2000) if(IsKeyDown('z'))then GetSelf.Show until(IsKeyDown('x')) end.[/code]

item.title: Can some one help me add to to one of my scripts?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

hmm…

Put a procedure as a talker then
Put a const under program and {.include srl/srl.scar}
Under that put message one.with a = after it…
then put what ever you wanna say

make the procedure then put a begin under then and a end;
put Wait({your wait time here}) then put…
Typsend(message1)
then put the end; here… and your done

then put (veryend)

begin
Activateclient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
repeat
(your talkprocedure here);
until(false)
end.
I think thats a auto talker but w/e hope i helped

Read full topic
